SEARCH

Uses of Package
com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.models.language

Packages that use com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.models.language
Package
Description
com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.models.language
Provides interfaces and data models that represent entries from the plugin's language YAML file.
com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.models.language.constant
Represents a constant record as an algebraic data type, implemented using a sealed interface with permitted types of ValidConstantRecord and InvalidConstantRecord.
com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.models.language.item
Represents an item record as an algebraic data type, implemented using a sealed interface with permitted types of ValidItemRecord and InvalidItemRecord.
com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.models.language.message
Represents a message record as an algebraic data type, implemented using a sealed interface with permitted types of ValidMessageRecord, FinalMessageRecord and InvalidMessageRecord.

    Section
    An enumeration of Sections that correspond directly to each top level ConfigurationSection of the language file.
